src:
Panggil Bos-bos BUMN, Erick Thohir Minta Kereta Cepat JKT-BDG Dikawal
04 Nov 2019, 06:06 by Achmad Dwi Afriyadi


Proyek kereta cepat Jakarta-Bandung/Foto: Istimewa/KCIC

Jakarta - Menteri Badan Usaha Milik Negara (BUMN) Erick Thohir memanggil Direktur Utama PT KAI (Persero) Edi Sukmoro, Direktur Utama PT PLN (Persero) Sripeni Inten Cahyani dan Direktur Utama PT Pertamina (Persero) Nicke Widyawati hari ini. Mereka dipanggil untuk membahas pembangunan kereta cepat Jakarta-Bandung.Usai rapat, Edi mengatakan, intinya Menteri BUMN meminta agar proyek kereta cepat jangan sampai ada kemunduran."Poinnya beliau meminta supaya semua yang memang sudah dipersiapkan itu tidak lagi terjadi kemunduran," kata Edi di Kementerian BUMN Jakarta, Senin (4/11/2019).Lanjut Edi, progres kereta cepat telah menunjukkan progres yang baik. Untuk lahan hanya tersisa kurang 1%, sedangkan konstruksi sudah lebih dari 30%."Tinggal sedikit kok, kayak tanah kan tinggal kurang dari 1% sudah selesai, pembangunan sudah sampai lebih 30%, ini akan dipercepat, mudah-mudahan ya," ujarnya.Terkait beberapa kendala dalam proses pembangunan seperti sutet (Saluran Udara Tegangan Ekstra Tinggi) PLN, Edi bilang sudah solusi. Dia bilang, sutet itu akan dipindah dari jalur proyek."Sutet sudah ada solusi tadi PLN sudah dipanggil juga, itu penggeseran, Pertamina OK, sutet OK mudah-mudahan ini on the track. (Dipindah) paling beberapa meter dari situ," ujarnya.Sementara, Sripeni dan Nicke enggan berkomentar saat ditanya hasil pertemuan oleh awak media.Simak Video "Erick Thohir Usulkan 3-4 Nama Wamen ke Jokowi"[Gambas:Video 20detik](hns/hns)
text:
Call SOE Bosses, Erick Thohir Asks for JKT-BDG Fast Train Escorted
Nov 04 2019, 06:06 by Achmad Dwi Afriyadi


Jakarta-Bandung fast train project / Photo: Special / KCIC

Jakarta - Minister of State Owned Enterprises (BUMN) Erick Thohir summoned President Director of PT KAI (Persero) Edi Sukmoro, President Director of PT PLN (Persero) Sripeni Inten Cahyani and President Director of PT Pertamina (Persero) Nicke Widyawati today. They were called to discuss the construction of the Jakarta-Bandung fast train. After the meeting, Edi said, the point was that the Minister of SOEs requested that the fast train project not to setback. "The point is that he requested that everything that had been prepared was no longer setback," said Edi in Ministry of BUMN Jakarta, Monday (11/04/2019). Continued Edi, the progress of the fast train has shown good progress. Only 1% of land is left, while construction is more than 30%. "Just a little, like less than 1% of the land is finished, construction has reached more than 30%, this will be accelerated, hopefully yes," he said Regarding several constraints in the development process such as the PLN (Extra High Voltage Air Line) sutet, Edi said it was a solution. He said, the sutet would be removed from the project track. "Sutet already had a solution. PLN had already been summoned as well, that's shifting, Pertamina is OK, hopefully the sutet is OK on the track. (Moved) at least a few meters from there," he said. Meanwhile, Sripeni and Nicke were reluctant to comment when asked the results of the meeting by the media crew. Watch the video "Erick Thohir Propose 3-4 Wamen Names to Jokowi" [Gambas: Video 20 seconds] (hns / hns)
